DOC.brief_title: Effects NUTRIOSE®FB Dietary Fiber Supplementation Satiety , Body Fat , Metabolic Syndrome Overweight Adult Men
DOC.detailed_description: Previous trial fiber supplementation yield equivocal result body composition , satiety , determinant metabolic syndrome . This double-blind , randomize , placebo-controlled study conduct determine effect proprietary soluble dextrin dietary fiber supplement ( NUTRIOSE® ) parameter overweight male .
